channel.title: Gig Economy on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Gig Economy on FinanClub

item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:30 Chances: Lyft has access to a network of shared bikes and scooters, providing first and last-mile transportation options for riders. The economy is on a recovery trek, which could benefit Lyft as a smaller competitor in the ridesharing industry. Lyft advocates for a statewide solution in Minnesota, showing a commitment to finding a resolution and returning to the market.
